"OpenAI is set to hit 700 million weekly active users for ChatGPT this week, up from 500 million in March, marking a more than fourfold year-over-year surge in growth, the company said Monday.

Dev Day announcement, summarized by TechCrunch: "OpenAI CEO Sam Altman said Monday that ChatGPT has reached 800 million weekly active users"

Dev Day announcement, summarized by TechCrunch:
"“Today, 4 million developers have built with OpenAI,” Altman said. “More than 800 million people use ChatGPT every week, and we process over 6 billion tokens per minute on the API"

6 billion / minute * 1440 minutes / day = 8.6 trillion

Dev Day announcement: "GPT-5-Codex has becomes one of our fastest growing models ever. Since its release, we have served over 40T tokens from the model." GPT-5-Codex was released on September 15, 2025 and OpenAI Dev day was October 6th, 2025, which means the 40T tokens were served over 21 days. This equates to  ~2T tokens per day on average.
"ChatGPT has 800 million regular users, but only 5% are actually paying subscribers." 800 million regular users in October 2025 tracks with 800 WAU in October reported by TechCrunch.
